name: Oh, Reader
description:
Have you heard the story?

The story about the man who by the end of months of isolation, became more book than man?

I know that sounds ridiculous but…

Let me tell you this story.

-------------------

An interactive short horror story about an urban legend, something that happened in my small town, maybe you've heard of it, maybe you haven't. I promise you, it's real.

-------------------

content warnings: death, description of dead body
